mapper.insert: INSERT INTO classes( id, grade_uuid, uuid, name, status, created_time, modified_time, hikclassid, yhclassname ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gradeUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hikclassid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhclassname, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM classes WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

DELETE FROM classes WHERE id in
#{item, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.grade_uuid gradeUuid, a.uuid uuid, a.name name, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.hikclassid hikclassid, a.yhclassname yhclassname FROM classes a WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.id id, a.grade_uuid gradeUuid, a.uuid uuid, a.name name, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.hikclassid hikclassid, a.yhclassname yhclassname FROM classes a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM classes a WHERE 1=1
